website_summaries.verdict: This LED ball comes with everything you need to get started – batteries, spares AND a pump. Even better, it's waterproof.
pros: Official size football with LED inside that lights up when bounced or kicked
Ball pump, spare batteries and extra batteries included
Batteries should last for 30 hours of lit play
cons: Air pump may arrive without needle, so be sure to have a spare on hand if you want to play right away

customer_reviews.title: need glowing gloves to pair with this fun ball
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun & works well because it stays lit as long as you're using it. The bad part though is if it's really dark outside, you can't see where to throw it... my suggestion: someone needs to invent glow-in-the-dark gloves for the catcher :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hansberger

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: My kid absolutely loved it. I also was glad that it turns itself off if no one is playing with it. Hilariously, we live in a rural area and it gets really dark. One of the boys kicked the ball out too far and then when he was almost to it, the light went out and we couldn't see it anymore. Just that laughter made it worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery connection. Light flickers or turns off!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. I had to take apart the led part and re-seat the batteries. I found there is solder mask that extends into the region where the battery would connect. This made for an intermittent connection with the battery. The light would flicker or turn off on bumps/bounces. Poor design IMO, maybe this will get fixed in later versions. Illumination was good however when it was working, and the rubber felt like good quality long lasting rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Jorda  G Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for my teenager after sundown!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my teenage son. It did need to be inflated but this was easily done since I wanted him to open it fully inflated. I also appreciated the email that came thanking me for my purchase and offering tips from inflating, how to find the nozzle for inflating, replacing the batteries if needed and and creative tips for fun play after sundown. The ball lights up very brightly with minimal impact and goes out after about 30 seconds of inactivity. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lexie1277

customer_reviews.title: The shipment, the ball and delivery time ok, but size chart on the ad is confusing
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent the item on time, no delays, everything was perfect just one disagreement on the size of the ball, I asked for a full size 6 ball, but the ball is actually junior size, it will work as my kids will use it but I wanted a full size for the night games with my friends, not disappointed as the ball works correctly, it lights as mentioned in the ad, everything works perfect, but in the picture for the product names of the ball sizes is confusing, the regular size on their picture is the junior size, and the junior size might be for toddlers. In the picture I attached, you will see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: gerardoahuatzin

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: The size 6 official standard size is smaller than an nfl football, it may be almost as big as a junior football but I bought another brand before, can't remember the name and it was almost the same as an official nfl size for the same price, this may be good for a younger kid but if you're a bigger kid or older you may want a real sized football, it looks cool but it's too small for the price but at least you can throw it really far and it looks cool the higher you throw it at night
customer_reviews.author: 380 megaXtreme

customer_reviews.title: Daylight games now extended into night
customer_reviews.text: My 2 boys(Husband and 14 year old) think it's so cool! Very bright for play at night. Feel and grip of ball is good even though it's not material of a real football. Very happy with it. Plan to use at our Halloween glow party . Great product for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgrl71

customer_reviews.title: Got kids?  Get this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim to help ease the stir-craziness of a 10 year old and a 17 year old. I’m so glad I did! What fun! Rubber football—not solid—that you pump up with the enclosed pump and needle. Pull out the strip to activate the batteries and smack it. It lights up nicely. At night, it looks reddish—almost like metal straight from a blacksmith’s forge. Expensive? Yes. Fun? Yes. Worth it? You bet. My boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: P Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: The ball really lights up as described. My kids love it and it's really bright at night.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that there is no on or off switch. The ball will automatically turn off after about a min after the ball is still or not in use. It does automatically light up when you pick the ball up or if you're holding it just tap the ball anywhere and boom it lights up. Its a nice size football with really great grip. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J

customer_reviews.title: Our grandsons love the soccer ball and football
customer_reviews.text: Our grandsons love the soccer ball and football!!! We love that they came with the pumps and extra sets of batteries. We also appreciate the tips about inflating the balls and fun ideas for playing that were sent to us via email. We are very pleased with the quality of the NightMatch football and soccer ball and we were happy they came with everything you need to get started playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased NIGHTMATCH Light Up Football as a birthday present for my nephew. Just give it a good tap to engage light. It will stay lit when being thrown due to the impact of being caught there is no on-off switch, and the football will self shut off if not used which is an excellent feature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a Christmas gift so it hasn't actually been used yet. My son wanted a ball that he could play outside with in the dark. Also came with a pump. A definite plus. Looking forward to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lovemuffin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Looks as describe
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Looks as describe. Came with everything included as shown with the exception of the 'needle' for the air pump. No biggie, as I have plenty of them, but the air pump that is included does not accept the standard size threaded fitting on the needles I have. However, if you have a standard hand pump you won't have any problem airing the ball up. Not too impressive inside with normal lighting conditions, but outside in the dark it's pretty darn cool !-)
customer_reviews.author: tate adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach at night
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my two boys, 10 and 12 for Christmas. They love it. It's their daily go to ball when the sun goes down. We took it on our Corn Island family trip. Spent hours throwing the football with kids on the beach. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Number 6 size is normal size football, number 3 size is junior size football.
customer_reviews.text: This light up football works perfectly in the dark. It's got a good feel and it came with Extra batteries and a pump and needle that stores in the handle of the pump. I like it a lot. I'm going to order the number 3 size which is the junior size football next.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Waitt

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until it just stopped working. We've had the football since May 3rd and it has completely stopped working. We've changed the batteries, we cleaned out battery port and it has just stopped working. I would really like to exchange it for one that works. It is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: matthew gerren

customer_reviews.title: Great for night time football
customer_reviews.text: The light is very bright and stays on well. It was easy to inflate with included pump. When fully inflated the ball is quite hard but not too hard to play with. Our whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyla J. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to grip, smaller than 'official', but good for an adult and an 8+ to toss. Lights well for evening. No issues with it bouncing around on asphalt pavement so far.
customer_reviews.author: Deet

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is SO much fun! I got it for my teenage son, and he had a great time playing with his friend tonight! My only complaint is that sometimes you have to wack the ball a few extra times to get it to turn on, and it would be great if there were maybe glow gloves with it, it can be hard to know where exactly you’re throwing in the dark. Overall though- I would buy it again and will likely buy other Nightmatch products!
customer_reviews.author: Avdawn

customer_reviews.title: Good ball but pump needle was missing
customer_reviews.text: The ball is good quality. It lights up pretty easily and is bright. Gave 4 stars instead of 5 because the ball pump didn't come with a needle so I couldn't pump it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: So excited about this item but when we received it, it simply just doesn’t work. We took out the battery case and replace the batteries and it still will not light up.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Koger

customer_reviews.title: Well made, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made football. I bought it for a youth activity at night and expected it to be a cheap one time use item. We will be using it plenty come springtime. Others commented positively on it as well while playing. I recommend it. The light goes out after 20 seconds and does not illuminate again until impact. Makes for a fun game of
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Glows well at night
customer_reviews.text: We have used this a bunch of times already and really like it to use at night. It has a nice glow that you can see from far. The glow will automatically turn off after a minute or so, but when you tap it, it goes back on. Its too soon to know how long it will last, but i will follow up if it stops working..
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my boyfriend who loves sports, especially football and wanted to be able to play in the dark (now that it’s winter and gets dark earlier) when he gets home from work. We’ve had this football for about a month now and it works great. He even used it for our turkey bowl this year. Really great quality and size. I don’t how long it’ll last but for the price, it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amanpreet Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Gave it to my little brother for his 11th birthday. It came with a pump and extra batteries as well as a tool to help you get to the battery holder. I bought this with the basketball and both are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyJohann

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought this to play for on the street and park at night. Does not require that much impact to light up. Usually just smack the ball before I throw it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother buying this. Stopped working after one hour.
customer_reviews.text: It appears we got a football with some sort of faulty battery pack as the light stopped working after one hour. We tried to change the batteries out for the new ones and it worked for a second and then didn't turn back on again. Super disappointing to give a gift like this that they were super excited about only for it to break after one hour of play. I wish we hadn't bought it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Extend your playtime into the night!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love that they can now continue playing after dark. The football is bright and seems very durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Linn Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great light up ball!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday party. The kids loved playing with it. Sun is setting earlier and I want the kids to still play outside. This does the trick and is so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Light up your night!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Lots of fun for kids and adults! It is a rubberized football so street play should be limited but normal grass is great! Very bright and fun to play in the evening! Glow sticks or glow necklaces will add to the experience! Great for the beach as well!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: The football has a great grip & sturdy. Grandkids love throwing it in the dark & seeing it float in the air. Strongly endorse the product. We also bought a companion basketball and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: New or not new? That is the question, kinda.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. Looks to be durable and lights up well. However, it appears to be used. There are scuff marks in several places and the included tool is badly oxidized. Paying full price for something that appears to be used is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sumens

customer_reviews.title: Over the top impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 15 year old grandson, LOVE it came with 3 batteries, it's sticky grip and the hit of Christmas. It really is high quality. Everyone wants to play with it and its glow.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Trails

customer_reviews.title: Football in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this thing for their nighttime football matches. Extra light and battery included was an unforeseen bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Interrupted

customer_reviews.title: Grandson love's night football and his night flight football. He States it's the Best.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the football, but it was for my grandson who loved and enjoys the gift. Especially at night. Football flight night begins. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this is great but it doesn’t work. It’s extremely difficult to get it to light up - you’d think there would at least be a “sweet spot” you could hit to activate it but nope. And once activated it turns off after only a second or two. If it worked consistently and stayed on longer than the amount of time it takes to start throwing it, I would love it. However the product I received is terrible and basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this football! This would be a great gift for any kid that likes football or playing catch.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it’s fun...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Had a fireside hangout with my nephews, brought this out an we had a blast. Really Kool.
customer_reviews.author: GucciRasta

customer_reviews.title: Great football!
customer_reviews.text: My boys loved it and said they thought it felt like really great quality. Great grip and the light is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Piscitelli

customer_reviews.title: Great football for any age!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the football and soccer ball, both regular size. I have only had them for a month, but our family loves them! Easy to catch and/or kick. Lights up great for night practice. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bright and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak about the durability yet, but it lights up very well and the kids are enjoying it. Clever gift!
customer_reviews.author: Momo3

customer_reviews.title: The children live it!
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids were so happy to receive these. Fun times even when it gets dark.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenagers
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this. No more taping glo sticks....he said it took a bit of getting used to but uses it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Childers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome football
customer_reviews.text: This football is very well made! It’s tough. We had it for a few weeks and it has taken a beating, from hit tree branches to how high can we throw it in the air and it landing on bricks, concrete, and hard dirt. The ball still works great and has no tears or cuts. We are very pleased with the ball. The plug for the light works very well, I rinsed the ball off a few times and the light still works great. Would love if the company would make an official size.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Broke broke broke
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea right??? I was so excited to see my son and husband throwing the football at night.... EXCEPT it worked for 15 mins and then never worked again! Don’t waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMama

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stay lit
customer_reviews.text: Football did not stay lit when used. Had to hit it very hard numerous times to get the light to turn on. Would not recommend. Returned it and purchased another brand which works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get to light up no matter what and when you finally did it wouldn't stay lit. Had to replace the first battery immediately when we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: When it’s really dark it’s hard to catch Only because it’s super dark and you have a glowing thing flying at you
customer_reviews.author: james Springtown TX

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun either day or night. Kids love it and even us grownups got in on the act.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: As discribed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. Now can play football after dark. He lives it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for nighttime
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old. He loves to play outside with it. The light is bright. Took this on the beach at night.
customer_reviews.author: shelly humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Football doesn’t not hold air for long
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this football as a Christmas gift, but unfortunately it doesn’t hold air for more than an hour before it needs to be pumped back up. The valve in our football does not work correctly and does not retain air.
customer_reviews.author: JDG

customer_reviews.title: 1 hit to the ground and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 hit to the ground the lights no longer work. The family was very excited about this ball. Only works sporadically now.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Better
customer_reviews.text: This time, the football and included tool were pristine. We ordered the other style and it seemed almost refurbished. We are much more pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wilpula

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Has grip and the LED light is so bright
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made, my kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids were needing a football to play with outside in the early evening, as the sun is going down sooner at this time of the year. This football has been great! The LEDs are the perfect brightness and you can tell the football itself is well made and will last! Also like that it comes with pump, extra batteries and instructions for changing. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M

customer_reviews.title: Didn't function for long
customer_reviews.text: Worked great... For a few weeks. Now it won't stay lit. The battery stack inside appears to be very touchy. If i is not aligned properly, the ball will not light. I can take that stack out of the ball, align them, and get it to light. But when I put it back in, the batteries quickly go out of alignment after just a few throws.
customer_reviews.author: DanDer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get this product to light up even after changing batteries
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to get it to light up at all since we got it out of the box and pumped it up batteries have been changed nothing is working very unhappy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Regina Rodabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball, highly visible, most fun we've had in a long time
customer_reviews.text: The ball is really incredible and easy to use. At first, I was disappointed because we got a ball that didn't work, but they immediately sent a replacement. I would highly recommend it. We have used it in the pitch black, or at dusk, with my 10, 8 and 6 year old sons.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a boy
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes his football and he's 16 years old. Thanks slot 😊
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap air pump
customer_reviews.text: Pumping it up the whole needle piece broke off inside the ball
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: On time, works nicely, grandsons thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson's 12 and 8, loved it, 12 year old wants friends over with glow sticks around their necks, two teams playing night football. Im sure it will happen at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Newbie 1 Canobie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My boys love it! Ages 16 and 11 plus all their friends.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Frankum

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball, but Pump Arrived without Needle
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this ball! It's super bright and fun. The only complaint is the pump did not contain the needle, so we had to find a pump to inflate the ball. Other than that - very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Canes

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last beyond first batteries
customer_reviews.text: The football has a nice feel, strong and sturdy. My 10 and 14 years-old sons and I love the football. Lit up well at night. But, the light didn't work after replacing the first set of batteries. So, I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: pamela wilks

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool football for evening time playing or night time lights up really well and my boys were really excited to get out and play with it when we got it.
customer_reviews.author: David Firebaugh

customer_reviews.title: Will review after Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift. Cannot offer a review until after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ligon

customer_reviews.title: It's so good for what it is - it's not a regulation ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so good for what it is - it's not a regulation ball but it's a ton of fun for my boys and I
customer_reviews.author: John M. Lafleur

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with in the dark
customer_reviews.text: We like to go for evening walks around our neighborhood and it's a lot of fun to toss this football as we're walking. It's very easy to see it coming in the dark. Before we know it we've walked 2 miles and had fun doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Tossing this ball at night gets the whole neighborhood into playing catch. The batteries last a long time and catching a fade at 9pm looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Worley

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Plastic football that lights up - does what it’s supposed to. Kids had fun playing with it at bight time
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: From Happy to Disappointed in Minutes.
customer_reviews.text: When it works it’s awesome! Exactly what we wanted! But after a few minutes of play it started going off with every catch. Every catch! Then we would have to hit it up to 20 times to get it to go back on. My son went from so happy to do disappointed in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MEML

customer_reviews.title: Light broke easy while throwing
customer_reviews.text: The ball was coo but light went out too quick and didn’t come back on when battery was replaced
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren and their friends have had a wonderful time with the light up football! We added light up snap bracelets so they could see there team mates in the dark! The Ball and accessories was exactly as advertised! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yo son loves this! Lights up, inflates well. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: It comes with pump and extra batteries
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it’s really bright and the material is good me and my husband throw it but it’s good for our kids we have the basketball as well
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great summer investment
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great investment. A fun way to kill time before evening events. Love that the light is motion activated.
customer_reviews.author: MThompson

customer_reviews.title: Love playing outside at night
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons will love this and be able to play outside at night
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our youth group and the kids love it. Lights up great!
customer_reviews.author: CO mama of 2

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Work
customer_reviews.text: Received the football. Followed the directions. Changed the batteries. Still doesnt work. Waste of money. Bought to play at night. What good is a light up football that doesnt light up?
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great Nighttime ball!
customer_reviews.text: This ball really surprised me. This lights up very well and is a blast at night.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Buddles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: This ball is high quality and lights up pretty good in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Seller is very quick and responsive to emailed questions. The kids love playing with this ball and have already had many hours of fun with it after dark. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SWM

customer_reviews.title: The kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. The boys are able to play longer outside.
customer_reviews.author: B. launiuvao

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Durability?
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive my light up football. We inflated it, took it outside and it worked as advertised. The only thing was the inflatable hole didn't close up and was leaking air. Called Amazon and they sent a replacement the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Official size?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's official high school size, but it's not an OFFICIAL size ball. Otherwise it works great
customer_reviews.author: Duke Of Panda

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We got the black and orange- shipped quicker than expected. Was not expecting it to be as bright as it is. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: batteries are a pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought both a football and basketball. They both worked great until I had to change the batteries. They haven't lit up since then, but the kids still love them.
customer_reviews.author: robo6398

customer_reviews.title: So fun at night
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The only problem is, that it isn’t grippy(if that’s a word) enough.
customer_reviews.author: darcy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It light up bright. SAFE KIDS USE IT AT NIGHTS. THANKS YOU
customer_reviews.author: Tracey A. Mastrocola

customer_reviews.title: The ball is great.
customer_reviews.text: The ball arrived as described and so far it’s recipient seems to love it.
customer_reviews.author: BiG O

customer_reviews.title: Play football at night
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had it very long, but so far it has lived up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: johnie davenport

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift, so haven't actually opened it. But I'm sure its perfect! Will submit a comment once gift has been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: It was too hard for my son but he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: james n cross

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. Came with ball. Pump with needle. Extra batteries. Tool to remove batteries. Much brighter than I was expecting. Great grip when dry. When wet very slippery, only negative comment I have for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is great! My 11 year old son loves football and thinks it's wonderful. The process of getting the plug in and out was a little hard, but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 13 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Gift requested by my nephew. Not sure how well it works but arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.author: M. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best on the market!!!! Perfect for nighttime desert games.
customer_reviews.author: Eric White

customer_reviews.title: A little aggravating
customer_reviews.text: It is a little aggravating putting together, however my nephew loves it. So I would say it is a win.

product_meta.title: NIGHTMATCH Glow in The Dark Football - INCL Ball Pump and Spare Batteries - Size 6 - Glow American Football for The Ultimate Fun in The Dark - Waterproof Light Up Football LED
feature_bullets: ✅ 𝐓𝐇𝐄 𝐔𝐋𝐓𝐈𝐌𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐕𝐄 𝐅𝐔𝐍 𝐈𝐍 𝐓𝐇𝐄 𝐃𝐀𝐑𝐊 - Enjoy the precious moments of a round of American football with family and friends. This Glow Football guarantees a lot of fun, joy and funny moments in the dark!
✅ 𝐇𝐈𝐆𝐇𝐄𝐒𝐓 𝐕𝐈𝐒𝐈𝐁𝐈𝐋𝐈𝐓𝐘 𝐓𝐇𝐑𝐎𝐔𝐆𝐇 𝐋𝐄𝐃'𝐒 - Impact activated LED's are built into our NIGHTMATCH Led Football. They ensure maximum visibility in the dark and are still clearly visible from a long distance!
✅ 𝐄𝐗𝐓𝐑𝐀 𝐀𝐂𝐂𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐎𝐑𝐈𝐄𝐒 𝐅𝐎𝐑 𝐈𝐌𝐌𝐄𝐃𝐈𝐀𝐓𝐄 𝐅𝐔𝐍 - Get started right away with the included accessories. Just unpack the NIGHTMATCH Football, inflate and play. You will also receive an extra pack of batteries!

✅ 𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄, 𝐃𝐔𝐑𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐖𝐀𝐓𝐄𝐑 𝐑𝐄𝐒𝐈𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐓 - Excellent quality is what characterizes NIGHTMATCH products. Our football isn't only manufactured according to the highest quality standards, but it's also waterproof!

✅ 𝐓𝐇𝐄 𝐒𝐀𝐌𝐄 𝐒𝐈𝐙𝐄 𝐔𝐒𝐄𝐃 𝐁𝐘 𝐀𝐓𝐇𝐋𝐄𝐓𝐄𝐒 - For a real American football feeling, our football has the official size 6, which is the most common and most used size for football balls! Perfect for adults & students!
